fields.name: FONote7
fields.fieldText: Please list out the accounts to be provisioned for {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} after checking his current active roles.

fields.name: FONote71
fields.fieldText:
WIP


Please select the courses and work shop schedule that need to be assigned {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} to onboard for Facilitator role. You can select more than 1 course.


Note - Prior to assigning the courses, please check the courses {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} have already completed by going to course assignment tab or account tab.

fields.name: FOAgmtUploadNote1
fields.fieldText: Please upload the signed agreement received from {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} as part of Facilitator on boarding process

fields.name: ReorderBkgndCheck
fields.fieldText: {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} background check done on {!Get_Account_Record.Background_Check_Latest_Date__c} failed. Do you want to order background again or consider on boarding without reorder.

fields.name: FONote8
fields.fieldText:
Ordered the background check for {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} on {!Get_Account_Record.Background_Check_Requested_Date__c}



Please record the background check result below:

fields.name: FONote8_0
fields.fieldText: {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} failed background check. Do you want to still consider for Facilitator role ?

fields.name: FONoteCC1
fields.fieldText:
We can only proceed once the training courses are completed by {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} and attended the workshop


Please check with in the canvas and confirm the Training courses completion.

fields.name: FONoteCC2
fields.fieldText: Cannot Proceed with on boarding process unless training courses are completed.

fields.name: FONote1
fields.fieldText: {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c} {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} is considering to onboard as facilitator ?

fields.name: Check_back_in_6_months
fields.helpText: {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c} {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} will get the remainder in 6 months if - 'Will get back' is selected.

fields.name: RejectionNote
fields.fieldText: Sent out the rejection email letter for Facilitator role application.

fields.name: FOFinalNote1
fields.fieldText:
{!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} is Provisionally Activated and notified via email.


Once he is assigned to the client, please choose the action 'Activate Facilitator' to complete the activation.

screens.name: Good_Fit_Based_on_workshop_participation
screens.label: Good Fit Based on workshop participation

fields.name: FOGFNote1
fields.fieldText: Based on {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} participation and input from the workshop, is he a good fit ?

fields.name: FONote2
fields.fieldText: Upload the application and 2 reference letters received from {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c}

validationRule.errorMessage: Interview date should be later than current date and time.
Interview (To) date/time should be later than Interview (From) date / time - {!Interview_Date_and_time_From}

fields.name: FONote3
fields.fieldText: After reviewing the resume and talking to {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} , Please summarize the interview notes.

fields.name: FONotInterestedNote
fields.fieldText:
{!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c} {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} is no more interested in the Facilitator role.


Facilitator Status will be updated as 'Not considering' on account record.

fields.name: BackCheckFailedOfferAlternateOffer
fields.fieldText: Considering background check failed for {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c} {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c}, want to offer alternate roles ?

fields.name: FOOfferOtherNote2
fields.fieldText: Please use the other roles actions to onboard {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} in other role.

fields.name: FOOfferOtherNote3
fields.fieldText: {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} will be notified that Atlas Dog will not be able to onboard him.

fields.name: FONote5_0
fields.fieldText:
Please upload the signed provisional commitment agreement received from {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c}


Email is sent with form links on {!varVolunteerFormSentOn}

screens.name: Remainder_at_the_end_of_6_months
screens.label: Remainder at the end of 6 months

fields.name: FOSixMonthsRemainder
fields.fieldText:
Please reach out to {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c} {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} around {!varRemainderDate} to check whether he/she still interested.


Task is being assigned to you to remind you to reach out !Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c} {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c} around {!varRemainderDate}

fields.name: FONote5
fields.fieldText:
Please upload the signed volunteer form and provisional commitment agreement received from {!Get_Account_Record.First_Name__c}  {!Get_Account_Record.Last_Name__c}


Email is sent with form links on {!varVolunteerFormSentOn}
